page.title: 17LIFE IN BINGHAM (2)
page.content: "The Leisure Centre is a good feature as it attracts many people." "The old railway is a good feature as it is nice for young and old." "I like Thursdays because it is Market Day." "It has nice fields and countryside." "The people in Bingham are friendly." "Bingham has lots of old buildings which are kept nicely." "There is a choice of things to do." "Bingham is surrounded by fields for nine miles in every direction." "It has a good Youth centre." "There is a very interesting church with some very old gravestones - the oldest is 1717." "Bingham is good for all sorts of clubs."
